product.title: Classic Dog Bed - Medium
product.description: A comfortable and durable dog bed made with orthopedic memory foam for medium-sized dogs.

product.description: Keep your dog dry and warm with this breathable waterproof jacket designed for large breeds.

product.description: Durable natural chew toys made from sustainable materials to keep your dog entertained and healthy.

product.description: Strong and lightweight adjustable nylon collar with quick-release buckle for comfort and safety.

product.description: Keep your dog active with this automatic interactive laser toy that stimulates mental and physical activity.
